import React from "react"; import "../index.css"; import Header from "./Header.js"; import Main from "./Main.js"; import Footer from "./Footer.js"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm.js"; import ImagePopup from "./PopupWithForm.js"; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setEditProfileClick] = React.useState(false); const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setAddPlacePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setEditAvatarPopupOpen] = React.useState(false); function handleEditProfileClick() { setEditProfileClick(true); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { setAddPlacePopupOpen(true); } function handleEditAvatarClick() { setEditAvatarPopupOpen(true); } return ( <>
